name: The Matryoshka Effect
description:
The Matryoshka Effect

The Matryoshka Effect is a fun puzzle game that involves moving Russian Dolls around on a board. The goal of each puzzle is to join together all the Russian dolls into one. This game was made for the 2021 GMTK game jam. The whole game was developed within 48 hours.

Thank you for playing our game!

Credits:

Programming and game design: BossManta (Tim)

Art: Catalow (Laura)

Music:

Forest Walk by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com
